name: TheQuayboardGame
description:
Click screen with cursor to begin and operate with left and right arrows and space to jump. 

An interactive-quiz styled Platformer which is based on the Quay's in Dublin's City Centre. The idea is to help bring Billí home by collecting coins and answering facts about Dublin correctly.

 Best operates on Safari, Microsoft Edge and Mozilla Firefox. Not supported by Google Chrome or Internet Explorer. If issues occur with game play, reduce zoom to 75%. 

Enjoy!
